roleset.name: to jump from a plane with a parachute
roleset.note: SKYDIVE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in call home. Comparison to dive.01 and snorkel.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from skydive.01-v)
SKYDIVING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in call home. Comparison to dive.01 and snorkel.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from skydiving.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: She went skydiving from a helicopter with her fiance

example.name: arg 0 only, most common
example.text: If you were nursing the baby while you were skydiving the baby would like like okay.

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: You-1 could probably go like PRO-1 do skydiving or something .

example.name: all args
example.text: PRO Skydiving from a C130 without a parachute with a pair of granny panties sounds like a good option.
example.arg: with a pair of granny panties
